name: Behind Masked Hearts
description:
Behind Masked Hearts is a LGBTQ+ visual novel prototype where a young woman learns about her feelings for her female friends. Choose either Mathilde, the goth fox girl, or Karla, the preppy cat girl!

Credits
Engine: Luna the Foxgirl

Manuscript: Nethyr_UX

Character Art: Nethyr_UX

Background Art: Moraneko Games & Mugen's Free VN Resources

Link to Engine

Windows Version Only.
Linux Version Coming Soon.

This is an entry for Vtuber Game Jam 2022 made by two vtubers: Luna the Foxgirl & Nethyr_UX.
